globals.name: font-feature-fibbing
globals.title: Font Feature Fibbing
globals.subtitle: Hey, do you support the font-feature-settings CSS property? Safari, look—I know you’re lying!
globals.description: Immutable, advanced typographic feature utilities that fallback gracefully with CSS alone. Works great on its own, or alongside Basscss. Apply ligatures, small caps, number variants, and more, with single CSS classes.
